review.comment:
HeartMatch engaged Believe Advertising & Public Relations to enhance our brand awareness.
Adrian and his team have been an absolute pleasure to work with.
We are very happy with the exposure and opportunities Believe PR have secured for us, and we loved how easy it has been to work with them.
Definitely worth recommending!
Looking forward to working with you again!

TopRankings engaged Believe PR who delivered PR and brand awareness in a timely manner not experienced by other PR Agencies. Our expectations and outcomes were defined, managed and delivered in a highly professional and realistic manner. The speed by which the successful mention and exposure transpired was fantastic and we would have no hesitation in recommending Believe PR to others seeking an ethical and proven PR Agency.

It was a great pleasure to work with Believe PR! The agency helped Djooky to reach the expected KPIs quickly and in a professional manner. We have gotten broad media exposure and increased brand awareness in Australia due to the efforts of the Believe PR!  They are always doing extra and coming up with creative decisions to get the best possible result.

Djooky's team is very satisfied with the work of the Believe PR agency as the main task - namely to increase the media presence and brand awareness in the region was fulfilled in a timely manner. The agency's CEO Adrian Falk impressed us with his friendly attitude and unique ability to satisfy our requests in resolving even the most controversial issues.

What's more, the agency's initiative and creativity in PR strategy certainly contributed to our final goal. We are grateful for such cooperation and look forward to working with Believe PR in the future!

I recently completed Believe's PR course, run by Adrian. All I have to say is WOW!! What an eye opener, crammed full of insider knowledge and time saving tips. Adrian doesn't hold anything back - I would highly recommend the course to anyone in business who is looking to improve their media exposure or wants to have a better understanding on how the whole PR things works. After completing the course I am far more confident that I can generate media exposure for my new book. Thanks Adrian!

Adrian is an absolute pro!  I cannot recommend him highly enough to anyone looking for PR that has high impact and cut through. He got us exactly the press coverage we were looking for.

We estimate we have gotten back a 7-8x return on our investment with him through skyrocketing sales. We actually ended up selling out completely as a result of the article he pitched.

Adrian's work ethic is outstanding and it was very clear  from the word go he was not going to give up until he delivered, which he 100% did. Add to that he's super professional and fully invested in the success of his clients.

As a new business Adrian's services have been invaluable to us. I can't wait to work to work with him again, which we will!

The team have incredible connections and think strategically on how to bring media exposure. I enjoyed their lateral and strategic thinking which brought prime time news results for us. Highly recommended.

Hey there Adrian!  Thought I'd drop you a note to say thank you so much for working your magic with the promotion of our brand iBidOnStorage.  The article you wrote and had posted with The Daily Mail caught the eye of other media outlets who also wanted to run with the story.  Combined, this gave us a massive boost out there in the market to the point our website crashed due to the weight of numbers being driven to the site.

I recently came to Adrian with a request to publish an article for my business and he amazingly got us published in The Daily Mail within days! I highly recommend this Agency. Adrian is a pleasure to work with and he puts 200% effort and passion into his work.
Adrian was amazing to work with! He was very thorough and worked tirelessly until our article got published. Def recommend!

I have known Adrian for around 2 and a half years. We met through a business networking event and have since worked on several projects together. Adrian is a master of PR and I have seen Adrian's work with several of my clients literally bring in $100K+ return on a single story that Adrian was able to get picked up in the Media. If you are looking for someone with valuable relationships in the media then I recommend Adrian and the team at Believe.

Adrian and the team are results driven PR experts. With a sharp brief, they helped Well + Truly meet and exceed its 2017 PR aims. Believe is a rare and valuable PR partner. We highly recommend their services.

Adrian is an outstanding PR professional. He worked tirelessly on my campaign and even got me an interview on the BBC World News program Talking Business which has 99 million viewers worldwide! I highly recommend Adrian and Believe Advertising
